attributes.action: make it cheaper to stand as an independent candidate for public office by reducing the amount required for the deposit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current system, with its hefty deposits that are required from all candidates, works in the favour of the large party machines and discourages the ordinary, but unaligned, potential candidate from standing.

This is not in the democratic interest, even if it is in the interests of the large parties.
